TemporalDirections.TEXT: ,Character,Dialogue,EpisodeNo,SEID,Season 52850,JERRY,Get out of here!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52851,NEWMAN,(From outside the room) Kramer? Kramer? (Enters Jerry's bedroom) There you are.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52852,JERRY,Will everybody please leave?!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52853,NEWMAN,I just heard that a postman spotted a rickshaw down in Battery Park.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52854,KRAMER,Our rickshaw?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52855,NEWMAN,It's entirely possible.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52856,JERRY,I want everyone out!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52857,KRAMER,(Exiting the bedroom with Newman) Let's talk in Jerry's kitchen. I'll make some cocoa.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52858,NEWMAN,(To Jerry) Good night.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52859,JERRY,"(Bitter) Good night, Newman.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52860,[Setting,Park],17.0,S09E17,9.0 52861,NEWMAN,There it is!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52862,KRAMER,Rusty!,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52863,RUSTY,"Oh, there you are. Oh, do I get the job?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52864,KRAMER,"(Sarcastic) Yeah, yeah. We'll get back to you. (Pulling the rickshaw with Newman) Let's get this baby home.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52865,NEWMAN,Uh..,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52866,KRAMER,What?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52867,NEWMAN,"You know, when you think about it, it's kind of silly for us both to pull this thing all t he way back uptown. I mean, after all, it is a conveyance.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52868,KRAMER,"Yes, that's true.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52869,NEWMAN,"So, which one of us is gonna pull?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52870,KRAMER,"Well, there's only one way to settle this. (Starts pointing back and forth between Newman and him with each word of the rhyme) One spot, two spot, zig, zag, tear, pop-die, pennygot, tennyum, tear, harum, scare 'em, rip 'em, tear 'em, tay, taw, toe..",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52871,NEWMAN,(Realizing he won) Yeah.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52872,KRAMER,"Best two out of three? (Starts the pointing and the rhyme again) One spot, two spot..",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52873,NEMWAN,"Hey, boy. Smooth it out up there. Too much jostling!",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52874,[Setting,A homeless charity center],17.0,S09E17,9.0 52875,REBECCA,"(Gesturing tward the book) So, you want to donate this to charity?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52876,GEORGE,"Well, I assume there's some sort of write-off.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52877,REBECCA,What's the value of the book?,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52878,GEORGE,"Uh, about two hundred dollars, Miss DeMooney.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52879,REBECCA,(Correcting. Stern) It's DeMornay. Rebecca DeMornay.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52880,GEORGE,Oh.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52881,REBECCA,"(Opens the cover of the book) Oh, wait a second. (Certain) This book has been in the bathroom.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52882,GEORGE,(Nervous) Wh-what are you talking about? That - that's rediculous.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52883,REBECCA,"It's been flagged. I know. I used to work in a Brentano's. Mister, we're trying to help the homeless heare - it's bad enough that we have some nut out there trying to strap 'em to a rickshaw!",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52884,GEORGE,"(Desperate to get rid of the book) Alright, I, I'll just take fifty. Do - do we have a deal?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52885,REBECCA,"Yeah, and here it is You get your toilet book out of here, and I won't jump over this counter and punch you in the brain!",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52886,GEORGE,I could take it in merchandise..,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52887,REBECCA,(Threatening to hit him) Here I come..,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52888,[Setting,Bookstore],17.0,S09E17,9.0 52889,ELAINE,"So, this book'll tell me how to get puke out of cashmere?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52890,CASHIER,Yeah.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52891,ELAINE,Great.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52892,JERRY,"(To Elaine) So, the worst is over?",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52893,ELAINE,"Yeah. Now I can break up with him. He's clean, and I'm the office hero.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52894,JERRY,Seems like you're better at fake relationships than real ones.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52895,ELAIEN,"Yeah, huh. I even got an idea out of it. the Detox Poncho.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52896,ELAINE,(Leaving Jerry) See ya.,17.0,S09E17,9.0 52897,JERRY,"(To cashier) I'd like to speak with the manager, please.",17.0,S09E17,9.0 52898,[Setting,NYC Street],17.0,S09E17,9.0 52899,NEWMAN,"Mind your pace, Boy. Chop, chop!",17.0,S09E17,9.0

DIRECTION.text: Starts pointing back and forth between Newman and him with each word of the rhyme
Starts the pointing and the rhyme again
Opens the cover of the book
Desperate to get rid of the book

DIALOGUE.text: One spot, two spot, zig, zag, tear, pop-die, pennygot, tennyum, tear, harum, scare 'em, rip 'em, tear 'em, tay, taw, toe..
So, you want to donate this to charity?
This book has been in the bathroom.
Wh-what are you talking about? That - that's rediculous.
Alright, I, I'll just take fifty.
I'd like to speak with the manager, please.
